UniprotID	P47901

EntryName	V1BR_HUMAN
ProteinName	Vasopressin V1b receptor (V1bR) (AVPR V1b) (AVPR V3) (Antidiuretic hormone receptor 1b) (Vasopressin V3 receptor)
GeneName	AVPR1B AVPR3 VPR3
Length	424
Function	Receptor for arginine vasopressin. The activity of this receptor is mediated by G proteins which activate a phosphatidyl-inositol-calcium second messenger system.
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane
